name: Dude, It's Your Turn
description:
It's 3 hours into board game night and your friends are taking their sweet time. Get them to roll the dice.

Made in 50 hours for GMTK Jam 2022 by members of Triangle Interactive Arts Collective

  • Austin Caskie - Programming
  • Gabriel Gray - Environment Art
  • Jeff Nichter - Music & Audio
  • Julian (SoupScythe) - Programming
  • Michael Schmitt (TooMuchTomato) - Character Art
  • TJ Richardson - Music
